channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- ua-parser-js
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- ua-parser-js

item.title: CVE-2021-4229|2024-08-03T17:23:08.902Z -- unspecified -- ua-parser-js
item.description: A vulnerability was found in ua-parser-js 0.7.29/0.8.0/1.0.0. It has been rated as critical. This issue affects the crypto mining component which introduces a backdoor. Upgrading to version 0.7.30, 0.8.1 and 1.0.1 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.
